data.trans_hint: Cậu bé tận hưởng việc đọc sách vì chăm chỉ học hành.
data.en_hint: The boy reveled in a book because he studied hard.
data.content_game_1: The boy reveled in a book because he studied hard.
data.answer_en_hint: The boy reveled in a book because he studied hard.

data.trans: Bỗng dưng ghét ai đó vô cớ
data.trans_hint: Tôi nghĩ anh ấy đã vô cớ ghét tôi khi tôi có được sự thăng tiến mà anh ấy muốn.
data.en_hint: I think he took against me when I got the promotion he wanted.
data.content_game_1: I think he took against me when I got the promotion he wanted.
data.answer_en_hint: I think he took against me when I got the promotion he wanted.

data.trans_hint: Tôi thích cô ấy ngay cái lúc tôi nhìn thấy cô.
data.en_hint: I warmed to her right when I saw her.
data.content_game_1: I warmed to her right when I saw her.
data.answer_en_hint: I warmed to her right when I saw her.

data.trans_hint: Tôi bắt đầu quý mến khu này.
data.en_hint: The neighbourhood was beginning to grow on me.
data.content_game_1: The neighbourhood was beginning to grow on me.
data.answer_en_hint: The neighbourhood was beginning to grow on me.

data.trans: Hứng thú, cảm thấy thích với cái gì
data.trans_hint: Tôi hứng thú với nhạc pop trong khi Jackson thì đam mê với hiphop.
data.en_hint: I'm into pop music while Jackson revels in hip hop.
data.content_game_1: I'm into pop music while Jackson revels in hip hop.
data.answer_en_hint: I'm into pop music while Jackson revels in hip hop.

data.trans_hint: Bộ phim Marvel mới thực sự làm tôi ấn tượng.
data.en_hint: The new Marvel movie really blew me away.
data.content_game_1: The new Marvel movie really blew me away.
data.answer_en_hint: The new Marvel movie really blew me away.

data.content: can take it or leave it
data.trans: Có cũng được, không có cũng không sao (Không đặc biệt thích)
data.trans_hint: Rất nhiều người thích đi tới rạp chiếu phim, nhưng tôi thì đi cũng được, không đi cũng chẳng sao.
data.en_hint: Many people love to go to the cinema, but I can take it or leave it.
data.content_game_1: Many people love to go to the cinema, but I can take it or leave it.
data.answer_en_hint: Many people love to go to the cinema, but I can take it or leave it.

data.trans_hint: Mẹ tôi không thể chịu được việc thấy tôi ở nhà cả ngày.
data.en_hint: My mother can't bear seeing me around at home all day.
data.content_game_1: My mother can't bear seeing me around at home all day.
data.answer_en_hint: My mother can't bear seeing me around at home all day.

data.trans: Bắt đầu không thích ai/cái gì nữa
data.trans_hint: Sau rất nhiều bữa ăn ở KFC, chúng tôi bắt đầu không thích gà rán nữa rồi.
data.en_hint: After too many meals at the KFC, we started to go off fried chicken.
data.content_game_1: After too many meals at the KFC, we started to go off fried chicken.
data.answer_en_hint: After too many meals at the KFC, we started to go off fried chicken.

data.trans_hint: Cô ấy cực kỳ thích tiểu thuyết ngôn tình Trung Quốc nhưng chúng lại không làm tôi hứng thú.
data.en_hint: She is mad keen on Chinese love novels, but they just leave me cold.
data.content_game_1: She is mad keen on Chinese love novels, but they just leave me cold.
data.answer_en_hint: She is mad keen on Chinese love novels, but they just leave me cold.

data.trans_hint: Cô ấy thích đặt đồ mang về và ăn tối tại nhà hôm nay.
data.en_hint: She would sooner order takeaway and have dinner at home today.
